compliant.section: Faraday reserves the right to provide Registration Data to our officers, employees, contractors, agents, and designees to the extent necessary to enable them to execute certain web services for Faraday.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing agreements are required with all processors, ensuring they only process data on documented instructions and provide sufficient guarantees of GDPR compliance.

compliant.section: Faraday also reserve the right to disclose such information to any third party if Faraday is required to do so for any or all of the following: (i) by law; (ii) to comply with legal processes or governmental requests; (iii) to protect the rights, property, or safety of Faraday.
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is lawful if necessary for compliance with a legal obligation or for the purposes of legitimate interests pursued by the controller or a third party, except where such interests are overridden by interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject.

non_compliant.section: You may request Faraday to stop storing, processing and using your Registration Data anytime by writing to Faraday's registered address.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to request erasure, rectification, restriction of processing, and data portability through accessible means, which may include electronic means, considering the technology used for processing. Simply writing to a registered address may not be considered sufficiently accessible in the digital age.
non_compliant.amend: Provide an easily accessible electronic method (e.g., email address, online form) for data subjects to exercise their rights under the GDPR, including the right to erasure, rectification, restriction of processing, and data portability.
